It was difficult to choose between Juju and Rooksporen, but I finally decided upon the latter. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: d
content: Paul Verhoeven might be the most famous Dutch director for movies like Starship troopers and Robocop but also Zwarboek and Soldaat van Oranje which are native classics.

title: Re: d
content:
Cool, Starship Troopers is a good one. I used to like it a lot when I was a bit younger. Should see it again. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] I have the DVD in my shelf.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
